altername_name: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden III: Sabakareshi Mono
Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story III: Those Who Are Judged
機動戦士ガンダム外伝Ⅲ 裁かれし者
name: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story III: Sabakareshi Mono
overview: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden III: Sabakareshi Mono (機動戦士ガンダム外伝Ⅲ 裁かれし者) is the last of three Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden games for the Sega Saturn. Unlike the previous two entries, Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden III was never released in a jewel case, just in the cheaper "Genteiban" form.
